document_data.mainbody:
The Law sphere was a group of spells granted to lawful crusaders. This sphere counterbalanced the sphere of chaos, promoting obedience, order, and the power of cooperation.
Many spells were available to those who had chosen this sphere.
Beginner spellcasters of this sphere could cast
* command
* protection from chaos
Novice divine spellcasters were able to cast
* calm chaos
* enthrall
* hold person
Somewhat skilled spellcasters were able to cast
* dictate
* rigid thinking
* strength of one
Intermediate divine casters had the ability to use
* compulsive order
* defensive harmony
Those with a high level of skill had access to
* champions strength
* impeding permission
Powerful spellcasters of such a sphere were able to cast
* legal thoughts
Divine spellcasters who had mastered this sphere could cast
* control weatherThis spell was removed from the law sphere in the Players Option Spells & Magic sourcebook. See page 187.
